title: Next-generation organic nanozymes offer safe, cost-effective solution for agricultural and food industries - Nation Online
text:
Nanozymes are synthetic materials that have enzyme-like catalytic properties, and they are broadly used for biomedical purposes, such as disease diagnostics. However, inorganic nanozymes are generally toxic, expensive, and complicated to produce, making them unsuitable for the agricultural and food industries. Source: phys.org Read Entire Article Source
